texts.label: text
texts.orig: Setting up new servers can be a pain if you're not able to clone them from a server that is known to be working. Many VPS providers, like  Slicehost , allow you to clone a system to a new system. Without that option, you can pull a list of RPM's without their version number for a fairly quick and basic comparison.
texts.text: Setting up new servers can be a pain if you're not able to clone them from a server that is known to be working. Many VPS providers, like  Slicehost , allow you to clone a system to a new system. Without that option, you can pull a list of RPM's without their version number for a fairly quick and basic comparison.
